sentences.english: I am a hardworker, have lots of energy and am a quick learner
sentences.chinese: 我是一个勤快的劳动者，学习能力强而且非常有活力。

sentences.english: And work hard, I think he will go far.
sentences.chinese: 工作又勤快，我看他保准大获成功。

sentences.english: How call you have the gall to complain about other people's being lazy?
sentences.chinese: 你怎么能厚着脸皮报怨说别人不勤快？

sentences.english: More what to can annoy BE, Chen Shi not only didn't obstruct, but also Kua Qiao Jean is efficient.
sentences.chinese: 更加可气的是，沈氏非但没有阻止，还夸巧珍勤快。

sentences.english: Though I never see him, my mother often praised he was a hardworking person.
sentences.chinese: 虽然我没见过这个叔叔，但偶尔能听到我妈夸他勤快。

sentences.english: After her dance she went back to her spinning and worked industriously.
sentences.chinese: 跳完舞，她回来继续勤快地纺纱。

sentences.english: In the light of his aptitude, personality and diligence, he will surly be promoted soon.
sentences.chinese: 他能力强，人品好，办事勤快，显然会步步高升的。

sentences.english: Atzel stopped being lazy and became the most diligent merchant in the whole place.
sentences.chinese: 阿采尔不再懒惰，成为当地最勤快的商人。

sentences.english: How can you have the gall to complain about other people's being lazy?
sentences.chinese: 你怎么能厚着脸皮抱怨说别人不勤快呢？

sentences.english: When everyone pitches in a little, you can strip out 5% in overhead.
sentences.chinese: 当每个人都变得更勤快了，你就可以节省5%的开销。

sentences.english: Does she work harder than the other baby-sitters?
sentences.chinese: 她比别的保姆更勤快吗？

sentences.english: Send back your answer as soon as you can, and be careful to write explicitly.
sentences.chinese: 请你放心，我办起事来既勤快又小心。

sentences.english: Wang is a hardworking man from a rural area.
sentences.chinese: 王宝强是个出身农村的勤快人。

sentences.english: She wondered what sort of herbs they were, which the old man was so sedulous to gather.
sentences.chinese: 她不晓得那老人如此勤快地采集的是哪种药草。

definition: variant of 賢慧|贤慧[xian2 hui4]
erhua variant of 幹活|干活[gan4 huo2]
to do what one is told/obedient
happy to partake but not prepared to do any work (idiom)/all take and no give
